live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
45296.summary: Some customers in The Meadows and Silver Berry areas of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
45296.title: Dec 23 – Edmonton (The Meadows and Silver Berry) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
